subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A federal judge rejected a bid by the Mets’ owners to have the remaining claims of a lawsuit in the Madoff fraud dismissed, and ruled that the trustee was entitled to collect up to $83 million.
snippet: A federal judge rejected a bid by the Mets’ owners to have the remaining claims of a lawsuit in the Madoff fraud dismissed, and ruled that the trustee was entitled to collect up to $83 million.
